name: DeathSports
description:
What do you do when humanity had no hope against its cat overlord? You appease him with deadly sports, of course! Compete in multiple sports such as: baseball, swimming, and track. Who says you can’t have fun while trying to appease the cat god Astro? He is one cat to rule them all.

Swim Game

This is a game to test your aquatic agility. Make your way across the swim lane while avoiding explosive TNT and deadly sharks with freaking lasers on their heads!

Track Game

You gotta go fast in this track game that seeks your demise. See how far you can get while jumping lethal hurdles and trying to avoid carnivorous raptors.

Baseball Game

You think you have played baseball, until you have played this version! Things are a lot more fun (and stressful) when the ball is a bomb. Try to knock it into the other players on the field in order to win.

DA PEEPS (Credits)

  • Producer- James Macanufo
  • Director- Madeleine Beiter
  • Co-Director- Layne Price
  • UI Artist- Alexis DeBrunce
  • Sound Designer- Charles Bodman
  • Sound Designer- Justin Thornhill
  • Narrative Designer- Dean Foreman
  • Programmer - Dorian Green
  • Programmer- Nam Nguyen
  • Programmer- Sean Mercer
  • 3D Artist/Programmer- Mark Watson
  • 3D Artist- Evan Bremer
